title: The Iron Curtain - Snap Classic
description: At the height of the Cold War, Ulrike Poppe just might have been the most surveilled woman in the world. But it was only after the wall fell that things really got interesting. Snap Classic - Season 9 Episode 15
itunes:title: The Iron Curtain - Snap Classic
itunes:subtitle: At the height of the Cold War, Ulrike Poppe just might have been the most surveilled woman in the world. But it was only after the wall fell that things really got interesting. Be sure to check out Luisa Beck, reporting on all things German at The Washin
author: paloma.orozco@prx.org (Snap Judgment and PRX)
